name: AutomaticJoints
description: Finds joints between Beams based on the incidence of their centerlines and matching predefined rules.

inputParameters.name: Rules
inputParameters.description: Pre-defined rules for default joint types based on 'Category' attribute of the Beams.

inputParameters.name: MaxDistance
inputParameters.description: (optional) Maximum distance between centerlines of two Beams (limited to segments) to consider the Beams as connecting. Optional (if omitted, a default value equal to the average beam height will be taken).

outputParameters.name: Info
outputParameters.description: Report and analysis of the found connections and any issues.
